description:
Fully Customizable Desktop Environment for Windows.


features
- allow change default output volume using mouse wheel on media module items.
- add mini calendar to date module.
enhancements
- add new settings to delay the show and hide of dock and toolbar.
fix
- dock and toolbar animations
- fix update notifications for release and nightly channels.
What's Changed
- Weg click focus issue by @luriusTM in #246
- Fix the issue related to popup & menu flashing (#136) by @luriusTM in #232
- Popup placement problem for toolbar. by @luriusTM in #253
- chore(lang): improvements on chinese translations by @PhantomPixel-0418 in #259
- Whole screen side opener extension by @luriusTM in #252
- Webapp pinning issue #193 by @luriusTM in #272
- chore(lang): Optimize Chinese expression to make the language more fluent by @PhantomPixel-0418 in #270
- Correcting some mischaracterizations by @PhantomPixel-0418 in #260
- Notification preview item(s) for newly come notifications by @luriusTM in #215
- #154 Issue fix by @luriusTM in #273
Full Changelog: https://github.com/eythaann/Seelen-UI/compare/v2.0.4...v2.0.5
